string.value: You wonder if #m200000000# will come crashing down because of the sheer weight of the #o9300347#s. You'd better talk to #b#p2032001##k who lives in #b#m200050000##k before that happens.

#p2032001# says that she's worried about the possibility of the #o9300347#s causing #m200000000# to sink, but she says she's actually more worried another issue entirely. The fact that the Nependeaths in Orbis have grown so huge maybe connected with the path to #m920030001#. #m920030001#? This may be related to the Seal Stone somehow. You'd better keep asking #b#p2032001##k more questions.
#p2032001# first had her doubts about whether you could be trusted and was shocked to discover your true identity. She says that she has seen your grand fate…
You, there. Your destiny seems to be special. Your long life, your history, that terrible curse, and the willpower you used to overcome all that… Who are you exactly?
Well, anything's fine. The fortune already tells me that I should tell you everything there is to know about #m920030001#...
